name: visual-ui-test-debugger
description: Debug UI tests while seeing the UI
author: poffm

visual-ui-test-debugger.disableCodeLens.description: Disable the in-editor Visual UI Debugger buttons

visual-ui-test-debugger.codeLensSelector.description: Show the in-editor Visual UI Debugger buttons on files matching this pattern

scripts.build: pnpm run -r "/^build:.*/" && (cd packages/extension/dist && npx vsce package --allow-missing-repository --skip-license --out ./extension.vsix)
scripts.code-server-up: docker compose -f test/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker exec vscodeExtension code-server --install-extension /source/packages/extension/dist/extension.vsix
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run code-server-up && playwright test && pnpm run code-server-down
